What are you thankful for this week?: He aha te mea e mihi ana koe mo tenei wiki?
What are you struggling with and how can: He aha taau e raru ana me pehea e awhina ai tatou?
How did you put into practice the script: Nahea koe i whakarite ai i te karaipiture / Kōrero i akohia e matou i te wa i tutaki ai matou?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Ko wai i tiri koe i te akoranga o te wiki kua hipa me pehea te haere?
What needs did you meet in the community: He aha nga hiahia i tutuki koe i te hapori i te wiki kua hipa?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Tonoa tetahi ki te panui i te huarahi kotahi te wharangi kotahi i te wa kotahi.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Tukuna he mema o te roopu ki a raatau ake kupu.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Tonoa ki te roopu mena ka tapiritia e ratau tetahi mea, i wehe ranei i tetahi mea.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Ka mutu ana koe me nga wharangi katoa, patai ki tetahi i roto i te roopu ki te korero i nga korero katoa. Me whakatika te roopu i nga hapa.
What does this passage tell us about God: Eaha ta teie irava e parau mai no nia i te Atua?
What does this passage tell us about peo: He aha te korero o tenei waahanga mo te iwi?
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Mena he pono tenei waahanga, he aha te whanonga e tika ana kia huri i tenei wiki?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Ko wai hei whakaatu i tenei korero ki tenei wiki?
What needs can we meet in the community: He aha nga mea ka taea e taatau te whakatau i te hapori i tenei wiki?
When do you want to meet again?: Ahea koe e hiahia ana kia tutaki ano?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Kei te hiahia koe ki te tirotiro me o hoa he aha te Atua e rite ana ki ta te Atua e hiahia ai koe kia ora koe?
Here are some questions to get your disc: Anei etahi patai hei tiimata i to korerorero.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Kei te hiahia koe ki te tirotiro mo koe ano he aha te Atua me pehea te hiahia o te Atua ki te ora?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Ko te nuinga e pai ana ki te tuku i enei kitenga ki tetahi roopu me o raatau hoa.
